action.text: Proposed amendment SA 107 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 107 proposed by Senator Sessions to Amendment SA 100. (consideration: CR S818-820; text: CR S819) To impose additional requirements to ensure greater use of the advance payment of the earned income credit and to extend such advance payment to all taxpayers eligible for the credit.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 107 proposed by Senator Sessions to Amendment SA 100.
